content.detailedDescription:
At 10:15 p.M. est, 3 of us were in a backyard and noticed a bright white light flying away from us going south. it would get dimmer, then get noticeably brighter. it did this several times and then got dimmer and disappeared right before our eyes. it didn't fly into clouds, it didn't go behind trees, it just vanished.
later,at approximately, 10:49 p.M. est(i looked). at first we saw 2 craft coming in opposite directions, then flew out of sight. they had multiple, different colored lights that would blink in a pattern never before witnessed. lights at all four ends or sides of the craft would blink, then a line of lights across the middle would blink, then light up all at once, constantly changing patterns. they were red, blue, white, orange, and green. there was no sound at all. 
 a short while later, we saw three coming in from different directions. one flew over us, then went into full reverse, then started going up as if ascending in the atmosphere. it ascended, getting smaller and smaller, until it was out of sight. the other two flew in close proximity to each other. flying in opposite directions, but came very close to each other, closer than i've ever seen aircraft or planes fly over central indiana and i'm 42 years old. 
  after this sighting, we saw craft all throughout the rest of our time outside. sometimes we would see one, sometimes two, usually two, but only saw three at once that one time. all together, i would say we saw between 18-20 craft. sometimes they would be low, sometimes so high you could barely see them. they would sometimes fly fast, sometimes slow. there was no rhyme or reason to their flight pattern or the pattern of the blinking lights, however, the one that ascended did blink in a more steadier pattern than the others. this started @ 10:49 p.M. est until we didn't see any for awhile and went into the house at @ 12:00 p.M. est.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 18-20 'craft seen over central indiana.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home from a friends house, i looked out my window to see if the intersection was clear, and noticed that the sky was a little brighter than normal.  i saw at least 20 orbs going in a south to north direction traveling at the speed of an airliner in the night sky.  the orbs were flying in a massive formation that appeared to consist of mini triangle formations.  i pulled into the local boat landing to get a better look at what i was witnessing.  as the orbs kept moving north, they began to twinkle out.  row by row they just vanished into the night sky (no clouds) with no trace of their existence.  once i arrived home, i wanted to double check the sky to see if any other objects were moving.  once inside i turned on the scanner to listen to minneapolis center and the local airport.  to no avail, nothing was being mentioned.  

i will keep a keen eye on the skies from now on.
content.summary: Many lights in massive formation fly over town then tiwnkle out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting off fireworks on a hill above the town of shadyside, ohio on july 10th 2010, with my two grandsons. appx. 10:30 pm a very bright silver/white light moved slowly from west to east. it was about the size of a dime held at arms length. it took about 30 seconds to travel 3/4s the way across the sky at which point it stopped. it remained stationary for a few seconds then blinked out. several weeks before this my wife and i were setting on the porch, around 7:00pm we saw two silver/white round objects moving from east to west at about the same speed as the july 10th incident.
 i was curious and my grandsons were in awe and very excited.
content.summary: Bright silver/white disc.

content.detailedDescription: My parents usually leave the blinds of the southern kitchen window open so our pet cats can look outside during the day. the last person to go to bed is supposed to lower them. as i was the last one up on the night in question, i proceeded to lower the blinds. i first noticed the object because i saw lights like that of a jumbo jet (note- fort lauderdale-hollywood international airport is only a few miles away). so my first impression was it was a plane ready to land. however, i notice there was something odd when i didn't hear any noise. in addition, it was moving too slow to be a plane. the object moved slowly for approx. 3 minutes and 35 seconds, before abruptly accelerating. i followed the object until it was outside my plane of vision. during the sighting, at first i was annoyed because i thought the noise might wake people up from sleep. after i realized there was no sound, i was bewildered until i fell asleep.
content.summary: I saw a bizzare object in the night sky that appeared to change shape

content.detailedDescription:
After looking on-line: gamma mind technique & remote viewing, went outside;was kinda tingling(awareness), looked up and saw an orange round light approaching, it stopped, i looked down just a second, looked back up, it was gone. figured it was plane with landing lights, and checked if it was headed away( should've seen red, green and strobe lights), nothing.
    then noticed ( around 9:30 pm) two white lights (brighter than stars)that were to the sse from me and at about 40/45 degrees from horizion, that were too level; and were blinking as if signaling each othet.
     so went and got my camera(kodak easyshare z612) and tripod, set it up and put it on video mode, did 1st. filming, then did 2nd. video( one that i'm sending, then made 3rd. one.
      after start video,zoomed in and was astonished to see what i was seeing. on 2nd. vid, went to get wife to confirm what i was seeing. as i was away lights seemed to close distance by about half and 'nosed down'.?The left light seemed to blink more then the right one. i thought that it was just a rectangle shape, but after watching vid. seemed that it was 2 tr3b's(black triangle)sitting beside each other( seemed like it was watching me)! on video, then noticed red lights in 'back' of craft(s).Also halfway into video a plane files into view between lights and my postion. made last vid.(3rd.) just a few seconds long and had to get ready for work, so went inside and downloaded videos into computer. was amazed when i checked it out( had not seen red lights with eyes outside), also did not know it had moved closer by half,and 'nosed down'.
      a few days before was taking pics of clouds and found a black triangle(blurred as if moving very fast), in one picture.
      in 2007, my wife took a pic of very intense lighting storm and upon looking on computer, there was disc with lights around rim about 1/3  from top of an oak tree at the edge of our field, as if it was 'climbing 'up nd out of field( it was about 20 to 30 ft in diameter.
      also have a pic of what looks like a 'portal'(slide zone), that looks like a 'compass'(4 points,north, south, east, west) somtime in 2007.
content.summary: Saw two white lights (too level) blinking to each other.

content.detailedDescription: What sounded like a low flying jet over my house in fountain valley,ca near mile square park, went out side to look, but saw nothing, other neihbors were looking up as well.
content.summary: May be nothing, heard low flying jet?

content.detailedDescription: I was staying at the sheraton hotel in mahwah, nj on the 18th floor on oct. 9th through the oct. 10th 2004. being in a stange room, i had a hard time falling asleep, constantly watching the clock. at 2:50am oct. 10, 2004, i noticed a light through my large bay like room window. i thought it was a very tall building with a blinking light for the airplanes passing over head. but, as i was looking at this tall building light, it began to move towards my direction, at a slow pace, maybe 30 to 40 miles per hour. as it came closer i thought it was a helicopter or a small plane, but then i noticed the triangle shape with red, white and blue lights blinking on the bottom side, the same trianguler pattern. i became nervous and bewildered. it was as if it saw me watching because it went directly over the hotel only some 50 to 60 feet above my hotel window. i saw it plain as as day and did not sleep for the rest of the night. i have a photographic memory of the object in my memory and i will never forget it for as long as i live. anyone i told, simply laughed and changed the subject. but i tell you....On the my life......This is a true story. god is my witness.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object with blue white and red lights on the bottom side, same as the triangle, traveling 30 to 40 mph towards the top and over the sheraton hotel. 50 feet above my hotel window at 2:50am on 10/10/04.

content.detailedDescription:
Unfortunaly i have always seen the craft throughout my life starting at age five, then twentyfive and now at 55. what is strange is that i am now being allowed to view them up close with other witnesses, and thank god for that because everyone that i tell thinks that i'm crazy. i however must admit that i am in fact a bit obcessive.  let me clarify that statement by stating that once i notice or get involved in something, it become difficult to stop it. i think that some might call that obcessive compulsive. but this condition can reap some beinfits or rewards.

when i first noticed these objects in the sky i couldn't stop looking for them. i have now seen so many that it has become unimportant to report them. which is why i am writing this. i want the world to know about them, but because i believe that they pose a threat, but because i think that most people find them extremely interesting to observe. it becomes overwhelming. they have now begun to come to my home. my mother who temporarily lives with me saw one of these circular object in the front yard a day ago. she stated that at first when she noticed it, it was glowing and stationary moving only side to side and up and down in small bits. and then suddenly without warning it disappeared. i explained that i have seen the object that she described and that they seemed to exhibit simular characteristics. and that what she described was normal. i have seen some of them up close (within 100 feet) and that they don't seem to pose a threat at this time. they seem to be as curious about us as we are about them.  so far they seem to be trying to establish a rudimentary launguage with me. so i am trying to build trust with the ones that are bold and courageous enough to come close. my mother thinks that this is risky behavior, but i feel that it is worth the risk, mufon wish me luck.
i have several videos of these object and a probe like object which i will not submit to you guys. but i want you to know that they are out there!
content.summary: 15 unknown craft in all observed by three people at the same time.

content.detailedDescription: I was from a dispruptive family and would go out into the school yard and watch thr stars for comfort.  this one time in the summer ( june or july) i observed a hugh object just overhead of me. it was stationary with very bright mwhite lights all around it and all over the platform.  this event lasted about an hour. during this time i observed small disks that to me resembled bottle caps approaching from each direction, stopping on the platform and then departing in the oposite direction.  finally i had to go home and to bed.  i'm willing to take a polygraph test about this event.  other things have happened to me since this sighting.
content.summary: The object was rectangular with bright white lights all around it and on what i now know was a super structure with small round disk approaching from the east and leaving by the west and vise versa.

content.detailedDescription: we started driving around 9:53pm to go to work. we were driving east on road 4 in moses lake aproaching a stop sign intersecting west shore drive. bout 4 minutes later at 9:57 approximately 300 feet in front of us was a big object (it was about the size of a military cargo plane)��� hovering��� slightly at an angle over moses lake. it had 6 bright white lights it was the shape of a foot ball with one very noticeable bright light on the left. we thought that it landed but couldn't hear anything so we drove approx. 100 feet closer to the water and it vanished. it made no sound or wind. we thought it was really strange because we didn't know what we were seeing. my brother saw red lights on the craft. i did not. (we saw the same thing differently) we are boggled and looking for answers!
content.summary: We saw a  huge football shaped craft with 6 white lights hovering just above the water 300 feet from us.

content.detailedDescription:
This is the first time that i see anything of this nature over the skies. 

i was standing on the subway outdoor platform for the 7 train in woodside, queens (61 st/woodside stop) waiting for the train, there were only a few people on a very long subway platform, i was alone.  i could see plenty of airplanes taking off and landing, it was a clear, sunny day.  suddenly i spotted what appeared to be from a distance an air balloon, but was was unusual is how steady the speed was. the altitude of the object was somewhere between the airplanes that were taking off and the airplanes that were landing, not too high, about the altitude you see helicopters flying at.  i would say that it was about 4 miles or less away from la guardia airport. as it got close i closer i could make out a shinny metallic sphere with what appeared to be its own radiance around it coming from the east at moderate speed at a low altitude, at that point it looked like a metallic sphere and not a balloon, the size was comparable to a small airplane but without any wings or visible doors, just a big metallic ball.  suddenly the sphere comes to a complete stop for about 10 seconds and then shots back the way it came from at about triple the original speed and looking like it had some kind of invisible force moving it, the speed was extremely even.  as the number 7 train arrived i got on it and kept on observing the object as it speed away until i could no longer see it.  

i'm wondering if you have any reports for the queens, nyc area around that date, until today i never was able to talk to anybody that saw the object or tell what it was, it was extremely unusual.

i hope this helps somehow.
content.summary: Ufo right next to la guardia airport in woodside, queens.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were parked beside an old white barn we had our eyes closed our heads on each others shoulder when a bright light hit us we thought it was her brother who had a habit of driving back there.  when we opened our eyes expecting to see his car lights on bright apx. 150 feet away coming around the corner of the barn we were shocked to see that the night had turned to day and no car!  i looked to my left to my amazment up in the sky  there was a perfect rectangle not solid it looked like those neon lights people put around there license plates i could see cloudes inside it!  if it was a mile long it would have been about 1/8 mile tall the left end was lower the thing was at about a 25 degree angle.  it stayed there for a few seconds then the left lower end started moving toward the other the light intensity stayed the same from the time it started shrinking, which took 10 to 15 seconds then when the two ends met the day went back to night without a sound.  as i stated this gave no shadow the spot where her brothers car should have been was on what should have been the shaded side of the barn but being as the barn was white it seemed to the brightest place around.   our local tv station wpsd said several hundred people called in about the "light" in the sky!  i dont know if this fact factors in but all this occured in close proxsimity to what at the time was called the atomic plant where a large, large portion of our weapons grade fisionable material was made!!!       my vantage point on this object seemed to be about 90 degrees if one were to contact others who saw it we might be able to determine more about its true size and if it had more than just the 2 dimisions i saw or if it had thickness and what the hell was  this thing it  has been in my head for close to 40 years!!!
content.summary: Rectangular light turned night into day no shadow produced by lite approximate size 3/4 to 1 mile seen by hundreds.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I submitted a compilation of pics yesterday, although the video with what i felt were the best captures didn't upload. the system saying that a virus was detected, which is odd in and of itself. i am submitting these pics from last night. my camera is an old digital olympus c-2100 ultra zoom. 2.1 mp at 10x optical zoom. as each pic is cropped the clarity wanes a bit. 

the center object in these pics as i observe them (using a magnifying glass also) appears like greys to me. could very well be an overactive imagination, but i don't think so.
 to the observer on the ground at the time of taking these pics this appears as the lights of an aircraft flying through the sky. complete with sound and all but the lighting patterns are not typical of what i understand about aircraft lighting.

 also this is a nightly occurrence over my home. thanks for looking.



p.S. i have over 2000 still pics of this high strangeness all captured from my front yard and am willing to get them to whomever may want them for benefit of figuring out what they are

also as opposed to looking like a materially made vehicle they appear holographic or light based the the ground observer. as the pics are developed some density seems to be at the core of each image
content.shape: Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like
content.summary: Pics captured as object flew above my house.

content.detailedDescription: Very clear night looking at the stars and saw what looked just like a star way up in the sky. i was looking straight above when i looked a bit off to my left and saw an object that i would have thought was a star if it wasn't moving. this was so high up ive never seen anything like it. white and bright light and round like a star but no glare or flickering like stars do. it was moving at a high speed first going sw and then making a half circle to eventually go straight north. it would block out light from the stars when it went under them. i can't gauge how fast it was moving since it was up so high. it covered nearly half of the visable sky i could see in 40 secs so that's fast. i know it was a ufo because the way it change directions. it seemed to fly jaged just a little bit but was mostly flying straight. never saw anything like it before.
content.summary: White sphere star-like object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on us highway 45 from platte city to weston, mo.  it was just after 1 pm when i saw a series of lights strobing or flashing. there were 7-8 of these lights, one would "flash," "strobe" or "pulse."  as soon as one would appear, the previous one would fade out.  they were in a semi-circular pattern, and appeared to be hovering over weston, mo.  the event lasted for about 45 seconds.  i know the time and exact location because i snapped a picture of some of these lights with my iphone- it recorded the time date and gps location when the picture was taken.

my feelings were curiousity and interest in whatever they were.

as soon as i snapped the picture and lowered my iphone the lights were gone.

i did submit a copy of the photo to steve winons and margie kay.  i am a member of mufon's kansas chapter.
content.summary: I saw what appeared to be several flashing lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Tonight, my boyfriend and i saw another ufo...It looked much like the one that i reported in case no. 24361.  this time it was hovering in one spot, then dropping altitude in arc type motion, then irratically flying back up again, this was no balloon, lantern, helicopter or airplain. i don't know if these are military or extraterrestrial, but it seems to me, they want to know about us and going to great lengths to make us little folks in harrisburg aware that they are here.  god bless.
content.summary: Another sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of sunday, july 11th at approxiamtely 19:05 hours i was in my backyard enjoying the nice evening with my wife and young daughter.  my 20 month old loves planes, and was oogling a jet flying over head.  i joined her in her oogling when i noticed this bright star in the early evening sky.  this time of night was too early for a star/planet to appear so i began to observe it for further tendancies.  the object was high in the sky so no great details are visible.  i did point it out to my wife for concurrence.

not knowing what the object was peaked my curiosity, and as i watched it i noticed it was slowly floating from the north to the south.  the intensity of the white light being given off by the object ebbed and increased, and occasionally shown a bright orange, similar to flame.  however no smoke was present.  upon seeing the orange flame like color my curiosity really peaked and i wished i had binoculars.  i then thought of my camera and took two fairly poor quality photo's (see attached) hoping through the zoom i might gain some details.  as you see in the photo's not much is determinable.

eventually, the object reached a point with which it had drifted beyond my vision.  i suspect it was a ballon but it seemed too large to be a general group of ballons, and too small to be a high altitude ballon.  i don't know who to contact to find out what, if anything, was in the area at this time and day.
content.summary: Witnessed a star like object floating across the sky from northwest to southeast over the sf bay area.

content.detailedDescription:
bright red lights ascend in a line and form triangle, disappear and return.

location in sky: from below tree line up to the southerly sky.

appearance: very large, bright, red lights.

last night i got a call from a friend who has never believed in the existence of ufo's. he told me him and his girlfriend had seen a legitmate ufo, not explainable any other way. he described it as bright red lights, ascending from below the treeline and rising up into the sky before forming a triangle and then disappearing.

fifteen minutes later he called me, as they had returned. i went onto my roof and obvserved the lights, facing the south. my girlfriend and my sister were also witnesses on the roof with me. first i saw only a few lights, they slowly ascended vertically until there were at least six (i estimate, i didn't count exact, or get a photograph). they rose slowly and eventually formed a triangle before they slowly dimmed, one at a time, and disappeared.

the appearance of the lights was a bright red, and must have been large in size judging by my estimated distance, minimum of 5-10 miles away, possibly further. they rose very slowly, and not in a perfect linear line as a plane would climb as it gained altitude. they seemed to exhibit a fixed x-y position relative to the ground, only increasing their z position (altitude).

they formed into a triangle, and then began to disappear.

these were not any kind of aircraft i've seen a human have. the detroit metro airport is nearby in that direction, as well as the monroe nuclear facility.

my friend witnessed the sighting prior to ours and the when we saw on the roof. our positions are roughly 4 miles apart at most.

i've included digital sketches of the two forms the ufo's took.
content.summary: Six fiery glowing orbs rise and form triangle, then disappear.

content.detailedDescription: July 4th party saw someone point to the sky. turned to look saw what i first thougt was a rocket launching. the  funny thing was there was no fire tail or con trail & it was in the western sky. rockets launch in the east. i turned my camera to it for about 30sec. then dismissed it as i don't know what. with camera running i walked over to people who also were watching it. they did not know what it was either. someone said ufo i laughed & spun my camera back to the light. it appeared stationary still. i then turned my attention back to the fireworks. later everyone i showed the video to said ufo. i am a professional cameraman  & have lived in florida  for over 30 years. i do not know what i saw but it was definatly unusual.
content.summary: Fire ball rising & hovering in western sky.

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i went outside on our porch to close and put away our bbq. as we were near the front door of our house my partner noticed a bright star like object moving in the sky. when she alerted me i thought it was a lightning bug (because i immediatly knew i wasnt looking at a shooting star, helecoptor or any other aircraft), because we have a lot of them in our yard, however i quickly discounted this because lightning bugs dont fly way up in the sky and they continuously flash a greenish light for about a second or two at one time. the object i saw was a constant light except it dimmed briefly like someone turned a dimmer switch, and when it dimmed it was for 2 or three seconds. i couldnt belive my eyes and almost wanted to look away, but i couldnt. this object was moving at a high rate of speed across the sky from north to south there were no flashing lights like on normal aircraft, no noise was emitted and the object dimmed for a few seconds then became bright again while still travelling in the same direction started to fly for lack of better words all goofy like, it slowed then dipped down then came back up. after doing this a few times it straightened out and continued on its course from north to south, dimmed once more, then brightened and eventually just went behind some large pine trees in our yard and disappeared from view.
content.summary: Bright star like object in sky moving quickly from north to south emitting no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
This image was captured with a wildview ez-cam digital scouting camera. the location is located approx. 20 kilometers north of belleville on (around the roslin/plainfield area near the moira river). unfortunately, when i set this up i forgot to program the time and date (the date & time with the picture is false). this camera is strapped to a tree facing a north east direction. based on the lighting from the sun, i could approximate the time to be between 1 and 4 pm. i believe the date is early to mid june 2010.  

the camera takes images on a standard sd card. when i walked back through the woods to collect the sd card to take back home to check the pictures, i noticed that little ants had gotten into the casing and were probably throughout the entire interior of the instrument. i knew that ants were in the interior (the mechanical section) because i could clearly see a dead ant on the inside of the lcd display (not the camera lens, the lens was clean, and so was the flash). 

the black object in the sky picked up in sunp3295 appears to be way to small to be an ant on the lens. it could be ant waste product, but why does it move? it was not raining, and if it were, the instrument is designed to keep out water (the ants entered through the smallest hole located on the bottom of the cam). 

what ever this object is, it appears fleshy and almost appears to have wings.

i kind of thought it looked like one of those flying monkeys from the wizzard of oz. this isn't the first weird image i've got with this camera, but the other image wasn't in the sky.

i attached the image picked up before and after the ufo (sunp3295). notice the little black dots throughout the tree branches (birds?). the camera, when working properly, will take a 3 image burst (usually 3 secs apart), but a delay in time suggests the 3 image burst wasn't working. this happens when the batteries are low.
content.summary: Flying gremlin or a bug???

content.detailedDescription:
my stepfather and i were driving home from the store when i spotted a very bright, high up silver 'object' that i first thought was a plane with a banner trailing behind it until i realized how high up it was , didn't appear to have any wings and was stationary.  i pointed it out to my stepfather who was driving and he too thought it was very odd.
  it was very bright silver and there were absolutely no clouds in the sky
(the clearest sky i've seen in a long time) so the object stood out like a sore thumb and we were studying it for about five minutes, long enough to realize it was not moving at all, or if it was, incredibly slowly.
  mulling over what it might be, a blimp came to mind as it was stationary and very silver, but it was too thin and incredibly high up... i estimate at the height it was, about the size of three 747's in length, slightly pointed ends and in between a blimp and cigar shape... longish, rather than cylindrical like a cigar or bulbous like a blimp.
  area spotted.... on the drive from midland and kingston rd. along kingston, to birchmount rd and kingston rd. south-south-west over lake ontario.  because there were no clouds it made it difficult to estimate how high up, just that it was very very high.
  at a stoplight by birchmount+kingston, our view was blocked from the object by a tree for about 10 seconds and when we were past it was gone!!
there was no way to miss it, there was nothing else in the sky, not even the odd contrail and like i said... it was stationary and very hard to miss in an empty sky as it was reflecting bright silver.  it left no trace of it being where it was, or where it went and i scanned the sky for a good ten minutes more to no avail.
  i hope someone else corroborates this sighting as i would like confirmation other than my stepfather who is rather skeptical of any possibility of things not man-made even though he clearly saw it and remarked how odd it was.
 sorry no photos as i do not own a cell phone... would not matter anyways as a telescope or high powered binoculars would have been needed for detail.
content.summary: Very high up bright silver stationary cigar/blimp like object.

content.detailedDescription:
Yo trabajava en una discoteca de hermosillo sonora mexico y la ���poca de salida de las 2 treinta y tres de la madrugada , caminando desde el lugar de trabajo hacia entre 15 y 20 minutos p���rr llegar a casa , recuerdo que faltaban 3 cuadras p���rr caminando venia llegar y con la cabeza agachada , me envolvia el silencio de la noche y de repente oia ladrar perros tanto uno ladridos lejanos como cercanos en eso me dio por levantar la cabeza asia arriba porque no podria entendre porque ladravan los perros , en eso vi pecado que discoteca se desplasaba de poniente y oriente en el pecado silencio total dejava una estela blanca , era de discoteca de fluoresente el azul de las naciones, unidas y alcanse una versi���n en la instancia de instancia de parte superior una c���pula de rojo fluoresente , al objeto lo envolvia una especie de luz blanca que asia que se viera su forma y colores , este objeto no viajaba el pecado ya gran velocidad pude verlo que por espacio de 2 minutos y 20 seg.Aproximadamente , tenerlo al paralelo casi una milla de las naciones, unidas podia tipo de zumbido apenas audible escuchar que no logre identificar , la altura no la podia ver se pero que estava mas alto que las nubes , nubes pocas habia porque objeto y perd���a este es s��� y salia de elias elias , cuando lo perdi de vista , me invadio una anciedad e uforia por lo que habia visto , mas camine 1 minuto y estar en la banqueta de mi casa al , me quede observando asia el lado donde s��� perdio el objeto , en eso escuche como una explocion ligera pero lo suficiente fuerte p���rr sentir como vibrava la tierra de bajo de mis pies , me hiso eso pecado dudar de lo que habia visto en realidad.

tengo otro avistamiento donde casi todo el vecindario pecado violencia este objeto el cual incluso reflejava naciones, unidas han de luz en forma de cono asia y el suelo que si movia lugar de las naciones, unidas de las naciones, unidas como si estubieran otro buscando algo , pero este caso los cuento s��� tiempo en otro
content.summary: Forma disco color azul con rojo flouresente.

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying on my boat last night and noticed two different types of ufos:
a) several bouncing like stars that would fade and reappear. 
b) i also saw 20+ shooting star like object, but they never faded out and they were longer streaks of light and faster.

also one last thing to note, before i went down to the cabin i saw a ufo that looked like a plane, but it never left the sky. it arced over head then hovered just out of my line of sight. 

seems like the water ways by brick and point pleasant are good sighting grounds. i also saw some on the 4th.
content.summary: A-falling star like, never dimmer b- moving eradict stars that dimmed and bounced and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
We were testing out google skymaps on the droids as i walked my friends out to their car. 
noticed large star-like object slightly west of polaris moving moderately fast upwards in the sky about a foot by eye. 
it then stopped, became slightly harder to see for a second. 
the object then jetted to the west at a quicker speed until it disappeared over the horizon.
total visible time about ten seconds. 
it did not appear to be any plane, satellite, asteroid, or artificial cloud study of any kind. 
both myself and my 2 friends witnessed this ufo. we have never seen anything like this before.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Stationary star like object, slightly west of polaris, moves upwards northbound, then jets to the west.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting with my friend in his hot tub when all of the sudden a meteor like object appeared to be heading for us from far out extremly fast. once it got to us it was flying very low with no noise and was a diamond shape. it had 4 white/natural lights on the corners that didn't blink. it was cruising while over the house, then stopped for about 1 second then continued to cruise and we lost sight of it in the trees. we concluded that it had to be a ufo based on the fact that it cruised over the house at an altitude well under a mile and made no noise at all. the entire event happened in about 15 to 20 seconds.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Meteor like object headed for house, then became a diamond like object that cruised/hovered over the house at low altitude and made no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night, july 11 2010, i stepped outside to watch the fading twilight at approximately 9:15pm central time.  i reside in manhattan kansas and have a porch that faces out west.  watching the early night sky brings much enjoyment; this evening brought a great shock.  i am standing on the sidewalk in front of my house.  

after 10 minutes, a strange color and movement caught my attention at the tree line in front of me.  at approximately 9:25pm, a small orange orb appeared over the nearby tree line.  the orb measured approximately ��� inch and was low in the sky, not much above the trees and appeared to be close in the sky.  it slowly pulsated, going from bright to very bright and back to bright again.  the color of the object was rich and seemed to encompass the entire object.  the orb appeared from the north and moved south over the tree line, moving slowly.  to my vision it then began moving out west.  as i stood in shock i noticed a glimmer over the tree where the first orb appeared.  a second orb, more red in color was now moving in the same direction as the first orb.  this orb was the same size and appeared to move at the same speed.  the only difference was its red-orange coloring.  it also pulsated.  at one point i could see both orbs and could contrast color.  the first orb continued moving south and west and eventually my sight was impeded by trees.  the second orb continued on the same course.  before reaching the trees that blocked the sight of the first orb the second orb began to flicker and then dim.  it went out and all i could see was a dark speck moving in the sky.  the total transit time for both orbs was approximately 3-5 minutes.  i stood in shock for a few minutes and ran in to check the time.  it showed 9:38pm.

it may be important to note that manhattan is approximately 15 miles east of fort riley, the local army post.  on the east side of the army base, nestled between the base and manhattan is the manhattan municipal airport, roughly 10 miles outside of town. 

i have never seen anything like this in the skies around here and was shocked to see something so strange.  i���m from an air force family and have spent time around military bases and air shows ��� this was like nothing i���ve ever witnessed and instantly created uncomfortable feelings and a strange sense that these things didn���t quite belong.  the color was strange and slightly diffuse, more like an aura than a light.  my eyes were glued to the orbs and i was restless, warring with whether or not to risk running inside for a cell phone or camera.  i judged they���d depart too quickly and stayed.  during their appearance all i felt was that these didn���t seem like aircraft i had ever known.  afterwards i���m still uncertain what they could be.  i did wonder during the event if this was rousing either the airport or fort riley.
content.summary: Two orbs, red and orange, over manhattan, kansas.

content.detailedDescription: On saturday, july 3rd i was camping at loon lake in irons, michigan.  we had taken the pontoon out on the lake to watch the fireworks after sunset, which was around 10pm.  the fireworks started normally, and then after only a few minutes they stopped.  after a few minutes i looked to my left and saw what looked like an orange ball of flame float over the trees and follow a straight line across the lake, disapearing into the sky on the other side.  it was traveling at pretty fast pace, like a plane in the sky would, but it had no blinking lights, just a round orange glow.  shortly after it disapeared, i looked back to my left, and from the exact same spot in the trees came another one of the exact same size, which followed the exact same path as the first, disapearing into the same area of sky on the other side of the lake.  when that one had disapeared, i looked back to my left and another one came out of the trees!  it too followed the same path.  half-way through this one's travel the fireworks started back up again, and it looked like it floated in the area where they were exploding, but it was not effected, so i thought maybe it was floating higher than the fireworks were.  after this one there were no others for about 15 minutes.  then as the fireworks were nearing their finale, one more took the same path as the other three.  everyone on the pontoon was very confused and we spent more time trying to figure out what the ufo could be than watching the fireworks.  afterwords, we asked a few other lake residents and some of them said they were helium balloons with candels in them, but i've always known helium to be combustable, and i didn't think a helium balloon would travel the same path without lifting higher into the sky and eventually popping.  i'm still not quite sure what it was, but it definitely made for an interesting fireworks show.
content.summary: Balls of "flame" floating over loon lake.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were at my brothers house in marysville washington, my wife and i were just getting ready to leave when 4 small bi-planes flew by and we were watching them when i noticed something strange in the sky behind where they had just flown by i said to my brother hey do you see that , that thing in the sky? he did and soon everyone was looking at it we didnt have anything to use to see it better and my camcorder couldnt pick it up but we could just make it out with the naked eye to me it looked chevron shaped,to my wife she saw cylinder, my brother and his wife saw round or disc it seemed to change shape and color as we watched it it did not seemed to move much so i had time to get  binoculars and look at it to me it was more chevron shaped we all watched it for several minutes and we were all shouting ,its a ufo,its a ufo but we all saw a different shape to the object as the light changed and the angle we saw it the object was moving very slowly and hoovering for quite some time so we all got to see it clearly for about ten minutes until we finally lost sight of it behind some trees we all talked about what we saw and we all agreed that it was a "u.F.O." we were all excited and talked about what we saw for half an hour i checked my recorder but couldnt see anything a bit disapointed but we knew what we saw
content.summary: When we first saw it, it looked like a cylinder but seemed to change shape as light hit it .

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east on the route 30 bypass i noticed in the distance what i though was a helicopter. it appeared to be following the highway going straight and level, east to west. from that distance, it appeared to be cigar shaped and without wings. as it got closer, and at an altitude of approx. 200-300 ft, i noticed that it was diamond shaped, rather thick, and silent. there's a 50/50 chance it was a helium filled balloon someone let go, but several factors add doubt to that possibility. 
1. it traveled east to west against the prevailing wind at a steady pace.
2. it did not continue to rise as a balloon filled with helium might.
3. it followed the route of the highway precisely. 
i'd be interested to see if anyone else observed this, even if it proves to be a balloon.
i lost sight of it as it passed overhead.
content.summary: Small, diamond shaped object following rt. 30 bypass,thorndale pa.
